comment._content: www.scotchirish.net/Who are the Scotch Irish.php4 This link gives you a history of the "Scotch-Irish", many of whom emigrated to the U.S. in the 1700's and 1800's. They were fiercely independent and fierce fighters. A lot of them settled in the Appalachian mountains of the U.S. after the "Whiskey Rebellion" in Pennsylvania which was in response to a tax imposed on bourbon which was being distilled by Scots in the U.S. www.bucklinsociety.net/whiskey-rebellion.htm
